title: [DVD9 Eng-Ita]Furyo - Merry Christmas Mr. Lawrence(bySPG)[UF]
description:
[DVD9 Eng-Ita]Furyo - Merry Christmas Mr. Lawrence(bySPG)[UF]


---------------------------------------------------------------------

Director:        Nagisa Oshima
Writers:         Paul Mayersberg (writer), Nagisa Oshima (screenplay)
Release Date:    2 September 1983 (USA)
Genre:           Drama | War

Plot:            In 1942 British soldier Jack Celliers comes to a japanese prison camp.
                 The camp is run by Yonoi, who has a firm belief in discipline...

Awards:          Won BAFTA Film Award. Another 8 wins & 6 nominations more
